name: Hear You Scream
description:
You've just awoken aboard a space ship and something's gone wrong. Main power has failed and an alarm is blaring. Where is the rest of the crew? Did you just see something dart down the hall?

Welcome to Hear You Scream, a science fiction horror-adventure game heavily inspired by the 1979 film Alien and featuring an art style influenced by the film's storyboards drawn by Ridley Scott.

Created in 10 days for SCREAM FM Jam.

Controls:

Look Around - Mouse

Move - WASD

Interact - E or Mouse Click

Crouch - CTRL

Jump - Space

Quit Game - ESC
